import React from 'react' import './FoodItem.css' import { useContext } from 'react' import { StoreContext } from '../../context/StoreContext' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' const FoodItem = ({id,name,price,description,image}) => { const { cartItems, addToCart, removeFromCart } = useContext(StoreContext); return (
{!cartItems[id] ? addToCart(id)} src={assets.add_icon_white} alt='' /> :
removeFromCart(id)} src={assets.remove_icon_red} alt='' />

{cartItems[id]}

addToCart(id)} src={assets.add_icon_green} alt='' />
}

{name}

{description}

â‚¹{price}

) } export default FoodItem
